title: These 7 Perfume Advent Calendars Are the Heroes of Gift-Giving Season
description: Coveted picks from Diptyque, Maison Francis Kurkdjian, and more will earn you brownie points.
excerpt: Looking for the perfect present? Countdown to the holidays with the seven best perfume advent calendars beloved by ELLE.com editors.
text: Best Viral Products Maison Margiela Advent CalendarJust about everyone you encounter can easily shout out their favorite Maison Margiela scent, and this advent calendar ties the brand’s most popular flavors in a gorgeous white box. Over seven days, this calendar includes bite-sized trinkets to scent your body and home, from a Lazy Sunday Morning candle to the accompanying body lotion and shower gel. Includes: Replica Beach Walk Eau de Toilette, Replica Jazz Club Eau de Toilette, Replica Lazy Sunday Morning Mini Shower Gel, Replica Lazy Sunday Morning Mini Body Lotion, Replica Lazy Sunday Morning Mini Scented Candle, Replica Mini Jazz Club Scented Candle, Replica By the Fireplace Eau de Toilette Best for the Royals Fanatic Penhaligon's Advent Calendar We can’t all make it to Buckingham Palace but here’s a fragrance calendar that summons that British royalty. Penhaligon’s iteration ensures you never leave home without smelling delicious—and your home remains a scented haven until you return. Luxurious perfumes, aromatic candles, shower gels, and soaps highlight Penhaligon’s rich heritage in this gift set. Includes: Christmas Candle, Elisabethan Rose Eau de Parfum, Halfeti Eau de Parfum, Christmas Charm, The Tragedy of Lord George Eau de Parfum, Halfeti Body Lotion, Quercus Eau de Cologne, Roanoke Ivy Candle, Al Ula Eau de Parfum, Duchess Rose Eau de Parfum, Halfeti Body Wash, Endymion Cologne, Empressa Eau de Parfum, Halfeti Hand Cream, Comoros Pearl Candle, The Blazing Mr. Sam Eau de Parfum, Halfeti Leather Eau de Parfum, Eau The Audacity Eau de Parfum, Quercus Mini Soap, Juniper Sling Eau de Toilette, Empressa Body Wash, Maduro Leaf Candle, Highgrove Eau de Parfum, Luna Eau de Toilette Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest for Diptyque Candle LoversDiptyque Advent Calendar If you weren’t a Diptyque devotee before, this calendar will quickly turn you into a convert. Housed in a gorgeous box with intricate illustrations by Lucy Sparrow, the 25 days leading up to the holidays are ripe with fragrant surprises. Featuring candles (mini and full-sized), body cleansers, and, of course, perfumes, fully immerse yourself in all the Diptyque formulas that made the brand a cult favorite. Includes: Sapin (Pine Tree) Candle, Friandise (Sweet Treat) Candle, Étoile (Star) Candle, Baies (Berries) Candle, Feu de Bois (Wood Fire) Candle, Narguilé Candle, Roses Candle, Mimosa Candle, Ambre (Amber) Candle, Pomander Candle, Odor Removing Candle with Basil, Orphéon Refillable Solid Perfume, L’Eau Papier Eau de Toilette, Do Son Eau de Toilette, Philosykos Eau de Toilette, Fleur de Peau Eau de Parfum, Orphéon Eau de Parfum, Tam Dao Eau de Parfum, Eau Rose Eau de Parfum, Do Son Scented Soap, L’Eau Papier Cleansing Hand and Body Gel, Fleur de Peau Hand and Body Lotion, Exfoliating Hand Wash, Odor Removing Room Spray with Basil, Two Decorative OrnamentsBest for Post-Holidays UnwrappingJuliette Has a Gun Not an Advent CalendarEveryone’s favorite off-the-rails fragrance brand’s calendar comes with a disclaimer: This isn’t your traditional calendar of yore. In fact, Juliette Has a Gun’s version of an advent calendar is set for the six days after Christmas leading up to the New Year. As the festive scents of the Christmas holiday dwindle, this set invites the brand’s signature “Not A” scent—a woody, ambery delight—to fill your home, from the eau de parfum to the soap and candle. Includes: Not a Bar Soap, Not a Candle, Not a Perfume, Not a Body Lotion, Not a Hand Cream, Not a Hair and Body Mist Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest for the Frequent TravelerGlasshouse Fragrances 24 Days of Christmas Advent CalendarGlasshouse Fragrances does a stellar job of transporting you to whatever part of the world its scent is inspired by. If holiday travels weren’t in the cards this year, Glasshouse Fragrances’s advent calendar makes stops in Amalfi, Taha’a, Kyoto, Milan, Capri, and more. Includes: Kyoto in Bloom Candle, The Hamptons Candle, Midnight in Milan Scent Stems & Vessel, Kyoto in Bloom Body Lotion, Taha’a Affair Body Bar, Kyoto in Bloom Interior Fragrance, Lost in Amalfi Body Bar, Sunsets in Capri EDP, Lost in Amalfi Hand Cream, Kyoto in Bloom Perfume Pencil, A Taha’a Affair Interior Fragrance, Midnight in Milan EDP, Kyoto in Bloom Hand Cream, One Night in Rio Candle, A Taha’a Affair Devotion Lip Balm, Christmas Ornament, Night Before Christmas CandleBest for Brand DiscoveryL’Artisan Parfumeur Christmas Advent CalendarIf your dream is to own scents nobody in your friend circle has, this L’Artisan Parfumeur’s advent calendar is the best investment. Over 25 days, you’ll be introduced to the French perfume house’s most addicting scents, including Histoire d’Orangers, which comes in the form of an eau de parfum, body wash, and body lotion.Includes: Histoire d’Orangers Eau de Parfum, Cuir Grenat, Passage d’ Enfer, Mémoire de Roses, Un Air de Bretagne, Mûre et Musc, Tonka Blanc, Abyssae, Vetiver Ecarlate, Fables D’Orient, Tenebrae, Ode a L’Oudh, Il Etait un Bois, A Fleur de Peche, Histoire d’Orangers Hand & Body Wash, Histoire d’Orangers Body Lotion, Passage d’Enfer Hand & Body Wash, Massage d’Enfer Hand & Body Lotion, Passage d’Enfer Hand Cream, Mémoire de Roses Hand Cream, Passage d’Enfer Hand Soap, Mémoire de Roses Hand Soap Red Leather Pouch, Ceramic ObjectAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest for Baccarat 540 Lovers Maison Francis Kurkdjian The Countdown Calendar Limited editionIf you missed the Baccarat 540 wave, or simply want to expand your horizons beyond the house’s popular scent, this seven-day countdown to Christmas introduces you to MFK’s other hotly coveted scents. An ELLE.com favorite is easily MFK’s 724, which arrives in a mini elixir trio; other standouts include the Grand Soir perfume, a standard-sized Oud Satin Mood body oil, and of course, the Baccarat 540 extrait. Includes: Baccarat Rouge 540 extrait de parfum, Baccarat Rouge 540 scented body oil, a trio of 724 elixirs, a trio of Es Cap, Au 17, Rue des Groseilliers scented candles, limited-edition Mon beau Sapin scented candle, Grand Soir eau de parfum, OUD satin mood sparkling oil, miniature Aqua Universalis Nerisha Penrose is the Beauty Commerce Editor at ELLE.com. Prior to joining the team, she was an Editorial Fellow at ELLE.com. In her current role, she helps lead coverage on makeup, skin care, hair, and fragrances. With over six years of experience in the world of beauty editorial, Nerisha enjoys delving deep into the complexities of fragrance notes, hunting for the best fixes for acne-prone skin, and advocating for daily sunscreen use. She regularly researches and tests the latest products, consults beauty professionals (including our Beauty Advisory Board) to determine the best expert-approved formulas to recommend, and conducts interviews with luminaries across the industry. Nerisha received her bachelor’s degree in Communication and Media Studies from Temple University before joining the editorial teams at Nylon and Billboard. In 2020, she co-launched our popular franchise The State of Black Beauty, an ongoing exploration of—and destination for—beauty at the intersection of Black culture.
html:
Best Viral Products

Maison Margiela Advent Calendar

Just about everyone you encounter can easily shout out their favorite Maison Margiela scent, and this advent calendar ties the brand’s most popular flavors in a gorgeous white box. Over seven days, this calendar includes bite-sized trinkets to scent your body and home, from a Lazy Sunday Morning candle to the accompanying body lotion and shower gel.

Includes: Replica Beach Walk Eau de Toilette, Replica Jazz Club Eau de Toilette, Replica Lazy Sunday Morning Mini Shower Gel, Replica Lazy Sunday Morning Mini Body Lotion, Replica Lazy Sunday Morning Mini Scented Candle, Replica Mini Jazz Club Scented Candle, Replica By the Fireplace Eau de Toilette

Best for the Royals Fanatic

Penhaligon's Advent Calendar

We can’t all make it to Buckingham Palace but here’s a fragrance calendar that summons that British royalty. Penhaligon’s iteration ensures you never leave home without smelling delicious—and your home remains a scented haven until you return. Luxurious perfumes, aromatic candles, shower gels, and soaps highlight Penhaligon’s rich heritage in this gift set.

Includes: Christmas Candle, Elisabethan Rose Eau de Parfum, Halfeti Eau de Parfum, Christmas Charm, The Tragedy of Lord George Eau de Parfum, Halfeti Body Lotion, Quercus Eau de Cologne, Roanoke Ivy Candle, Al Ula Eau de Parfum, Duchess Rose Eau de Parfum, Halfeti Body Wash, Endymion Cologne, Empressa Eau de Parfum, Halfeti Hand Cream, Comoros Pearl Candle, The Blazing Mr. Sam Eau de Parfum, Halfeti Leather Eau de Parfum, Eau The Audacity Eau de Parfum, Quercus Mini Soap, Juniper Sling Eau de Toilette, Empressa Body Wash, Maduro Leaf Candle, Highgrove Eau de Parfum, Luna Eau de Toilette

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best for Diptyque Candle Lovers

Diptyque Advent Calendar

If you weren’t a Diptyque devotee before, this calendar will quickly turn you into a convert. Housed in a gorgeous box with intricate illustrations by Lucy Sparrow, the 25 days leading up to the holidays are ripe with fragrant surprises. Featuring candles (mini and full-sized), body cleansers, and, of course, perfumes, fully immerse yourself in all the Diptyque formulas that made the brand a cult favorite.

Includes: Sapin (Pine Tree) Candle, Friandise (Sweet Treat) Candle, Étoile (Star) Candle, Baies (Berries) Candle, Feu de Bois (Wood Fire) Candle, Narguilé Candle, Roses Candle, Mimosa Candle, Ambre (Amber) Candle, Pomander Candle, Odor Removing Candle with Basil, Orphéon Refillable Solid Perfume, L’Eau Papier Eau de Toilette, Do Son Eau de Toilette, Philosykos Eau de Toilette, Fleur de Peau Eau de Parfum, Orphéon Eau de Parfum, Tam Dao Eau de Parfum, Eau Rose Eau de Parfum, Do Son Scented Soap, L’Eau Papier Cleansing Hand and Body Gel, Fleur de Peau Hand and Body Lotion, Exfoliating Hand Wash, Odor Removing Room Spray with Basil, Two Decorative Ornaments

Best for Post-Holidays Unwrapping

Juliette Has a Gun Not an Advent Calendar

Everyone’s favorite off-the-rails fragrance brand’s calendar comes with a disclaimer: This isn’t your traditional calendar of yore. In fact, Juliette Has a Gun’s version of an advent calendar is set for the six days after Christmas leading up to the New Year. As the festive scents of the Christmas holiday dwindle, this set invites the brand’s signature “Not A” scent—a woody, ambery delight—to fill your home, from the eau de parfum to the soap and candle.

Includes: Not a Bar Soap, Not a Candle, Not a Perfume, Not a Body Lotion, Not a Hand Cream, Not a Hair and Body Mist

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best for the Frequent Traveler

Glasshouse Fragrances 24 Days of Christmas Advent Calendar

Glasshouse Fragrances does a stellar job of transporting you to whatever part of the world its scent is inspired by. If holiday travels weren’t in the cards this year, Glasshouse Fragrances’s advent calendar makes stops in Amalfi, Taha’a, Kyoto, Milan, Capri, and more.

Includes: Kyoto in Bloom Candle, The Hamptons Candle, Midnight in Milan Scent Stems & Vessel, Kyoto in Bloom Body Lotion, Taha’a Affair Body Bar, Kyoto in Bloom Interior Fragrance, Lost in Amalfi Body Bar, Sunsets in Capri EDP, Lost in Amalfi Hand Cream, Kyoto in Bloom Perfume Pencil, A Taha’a Affair Interior Fragrance, Midnight in Milan EDP, Kyoto in Bloom Hand Cream, One Night in Rio Candle, A Taha’a Affair Devotion Lip Balm, Christmas Ornament, Night Before Christmas Candle

Best for Brand Discovery

L’Artisan Parfumeur Christmas Advent Calendar

If your dream is to own scents nobody in your friend circle has, this L’Artisan Parfumeur’s advent calendar is the best investment. Over 25 days, you’ll be introduced to the French perfume house’s most addicting scents, including Histoire d’Orangers, which comes in the form of an eau de parfum, body wash, and body lotion.

Includes: Histoire d’Orangers Eau de Parfum, Cuir Grenat, Passage d’ Enfer, Mémoire de Roses, Un Air de Bretagne, Mûre et Musc, Tonka Blanc, Abyssae, Vetiver Ecarlate, Fables D’Orient, Tenebrae, Ode a L’Oudh, Il Etait un Bois, A Fleur de Peche, Histoire d’Orangers Hand & Body Wash, Histoire d’Orangers Body Lotion, Passage d’Enfer Hand & Body Wash, Massage d’Enfer Hand & Body Lotion, Passage d’Enfer Hand Cream, Mémoire de Roses Hand Cream, Passage d’Enfer Hand Soap, Mémoire de Roses Hand Soap Red Leather Pouch, Ceramic Object

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best for Baccarat 540 Lovers

Maison Francis Kurkdjian The Countdown Calendar Limited edition

If you missed the Baccarat 540 wave, or simply want to expand your horizons beyond the house’s popular scent, this seven-day countdown to Christmas introduces you to MFK’s other hotly coveted scents. An ELLE.com favorite is easily MFK’s 724, which arrives in a mini elixir trio; other standouts include the Grand Soir perfume, a standard-sized Oud Satin Mood body oil, and of course, the Baccarat 540 extrait.

Includes: Baccarat Rouge 540 extrait de parfum, Baccarat Rouge 540 scented body oil, a trio of 724 elixirs, a trio of Es Cap, Au 17, Rue des Groseilliers scented candles, limited-edition Mon beau Sapin scented candle, Grand Soir eau de parfum, OUD satin mood sparkling oil, miniature Aqua Universalis

Nerisha Penrose is the Beauty Commerce Editor at ELLE.com. Prior to joining the team, she was an Editorial Fellow at ELLE.com. In her current role, she helps lead coverage on makeup, skin care, hair, and fragrances. With over six years of experience in the world of beauty editorial, Nerisha enjoys delving deep into the complexities of fragrance notes, hunting for the best fixes for acne-prone skin, and advocating for daily sunscreen use. She regularly researches and tests the latest products, consults beauty professionals (including our Beauty Advisory Board) to determine the best expert-approved formulas to recommend, and conducts interviews with luminaries across the industry. Nerisha received her bachelor’s degree in Communication and Media Studies from Temple University before joining the editorial teams at Nylon and Billboard. In 2020, she co-launched our popular franchise The State of Black Beauty, an ongoing exploration of—and destination for—beauty at the intersection of Black culture.
